title: The Miracle of the Bells (1948 Drama) Directed by Irving Pichel - Hollywood Meets Heaven!

sources.title: The Miracle of the Bells (1948 Drama) Directed by Irving Pichel - Hollywood Meets Heaven!
sources.description:
Press agent Bill Dunnigan convinces Coaltown's churches to ring their bells for three days, honoring the late actress Olga Treskovna and promoting her final film. This act inspires nationwide faith, turning mourning into a miraculous premiere. Father Paul offers spiritual guidance, highlighting the transformative power of belief.

Original title: The Miracle of the Bells (1948)

Director: Irving Pichel
Writers: Russell Janney, Ben Hecht, Quentin Reynolds
Stars: Fred MacMurray, Alida Valli, Frank Sinatra

Main cast:
Fred MacMurray - William 'Bill' Dunnigan
Alida Valli - Olga Treskovna
Frank Sinatra - Father Paul
Lee J. Cobb - Marcus Harris

Genres: Drama
Release date: March 26, 1948


Availability varies by region
